text: you know you should do buy LED light
bulbs they last 25 times longer than
regular bulbs but they use only a
fraction of the electricity
there's no mercury or anything else
nasty they come on to full brightness
instantly they're dimmable they're cool
even after they've been turned on and
the light color is wonderful so why
aren't they everywhere because of price
and size but both of those things are
changing fast this week I tried out the
3m advanced LED bulbs and the even less
expensive Cree bulbs they look a little
different but they fit anywhere an
incandescent bulb would go but why stop
there
LED bulbs are electronics soaked it's
like the Insteon and the philips hue
come with an attachment for your router
that controls the bulbs remotely from
your phone even the color the novelty
wears off but come on how cool is that
the torch star models come with a little
remote you don't need a router or a
phone I'm super excited about LED light
bulbs and you should be too insert your
own joke here about what a bright idea
they are
